com.ppfold.algo

Interface Progress

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NullProgress, PPfoldProgressBar

    public interface Progress
    Interface for a progress bar
    Author:
    M.Vaerum

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void checkStop()
      Check whether we should stop the ongoing process.
      Progress getChildProgress(double fraction)
      Get a suitable Activity for a child process.
      java.lang.String getCurrentActivity()
      Returns a short description of what is going on right now.

      Get the current progress (from 0.0 to 1.0).

    • Method Detail

      • getProgress

        double getProgress()
        Get the current progress (from 0.0 to 1.0).
        Returns:
        the current progress

      • setProgress

        void setProgress(double progress)
        Set the progress. Use Double.NaN to indicate that the progress is unknown.
        Parameters:
        progress - the progress (between 0.0 and 1.0)

      • getChildProgress

        Progress getChildProgress(double fraction)
        Get a suitable Activity for a child process.
        Parameters:
        fraction - the fraction of the overall progress that the child process represents
        Returns:
        a child Activity

      • isSuspended

        boolean isSuspended()
        Check whether the process is suspended.
        Returns:
        Whether the process is suspended.

      • setSuspended

        void setSuspended(boolean isSuspended)
        Set whether the process should suspend.
        Parameters:
        isSuspended - whether the process should suspend

      • shouldStop

        boolean shouldStop()
        Check whether we should stop the ongoing process. The thread will sleep if the process is suspended.
        Returns:
        whether we should stop

      • checkStop

        void checkStop()
               throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Check whether we should stop the ongoing process. The thread will sleep if the process is suspended.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if the process should be stopped.

      • setCurrentActivity

        void setCurrentActivity(java.lang.String activity)
        Sets a short description of what is going on right now.
        Parameters:
        activity -

      • getCurrentActivity

        java.lang.String getCurrentActivity()
        Returns a short description of what is going on right now.
